desc: Ricochet Offroad makes skid plates for your Motorcycle, ATV, UTV and Toyota. We manufacture a-arm guards, rock slider skids and frame skid plates. ATV bumpers, dirt bike kickstands and pipe guards. Aluminum or UHMW skid plate sets. Customize your plates with a color anodize option. Made in the USA we ship worldwide.

layout.text: Complete Armor Kits built with UHMW or Aluminum. Customized to your spec.
